channel.title: MINDJACK
channel.description:
who else has heard of mind jack?
when the hell was this game announced at e3? it sounds like earth defense force 2017's creators decided to make another game. if i didn't know better I'd say it was some kind of 4 Chan meme or shit but its apparently legit.
did anyone actually see this trailer at e3? trailer: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GXUuLJYhWmY[/url]

item.title: MINDJACK
item.dc:creator: Hair-Man
item.description:
The voice acting is horrible, graphics are okay but not great, gameplay looks really stiff and boring. I think the whole concept of the game is going to fail horribly.

Read full topic

item.title: MINDJACK
item.dc:creator: JamesKane
item.description:
I played it at E3…honestly it was retarded…

Not only are the controls awful, but the gameplay is retarded and sluggish; I emptied a full clip into a target and he didn’t die due to the regen health…yet I died instantly when he meleed me. Another time I killed someone with a pistol while taking several shots from a sniper rifle.

Once you are dead you move around like a ghost where every player including the opposing team can see you.
So if you are not careful as soon as you enter a body or host you will get raped.

The placement of the hosts are random, but a few times I seen them stuck in a wall or prop.

:fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: MINDJACK

item.description:
He sounded like he was doing a comedy trailer. It was pretty funny. Anyway, looks aggressively average and not worth thinking about.
